reg_info.full_title: R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 928: MEMBERS' DUTY TO PREPARE INFORMATIONS
reg_info.citation: R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 928: MEMBERS' DUTY TO PREPARE INFORMATIONS

content.content: 1. (1) Every information sworn by a member of a police force that alleges the commission of an offence under an Act of the Parliament of Canada or of the Legislature of Ontario shall be prepared by a member of a police force. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 928, s. 1 (1). (2) Every information referred to in subsection (1) shall be prepared in a manner suitable for laying before a justice of the peace, on a prescribed form where it is required. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 928, s. 1 (2). Français
content.raw_html:
1. (1) Every information sworn by a member of a police force that alleges the commission of an offence under an Act of the Parliament of Canada or of the Legislature of Ontario shall be prepared by a member of a police force. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 928, s. 1 (1).

(2) Every information referred to in subsection (1) shall be prepared in a manner suitable for laying before a justice of the peace, on a prescribed form where it is required. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 928, s. 1 (2).

Français
